Sentence: An obvious difference was observed, with the decrease in temperature, and the magnetization (or magnetic susceptibility) of Mn 3.52 Gd 0.48 N shows an anomalous minimum around 50 K, which was not observed in Mn 3.9 Gd 0.10 N.

For a better understanding of the magnetic properties of the Mn 4-x Gd x N film, magnetization as a function of temperature (M-T curves) was measured with an applied in-plane magnetic field of 1000 Oe in zero-field- cooled (ZFC), as shown in Figs. ) and 2(d).
